hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said:"Wouldn't anyone of you like to find three great, fat pregnant she-camels when he returns to his family?" We said: "Yes." He said: "Three verses that one of you recites during the praer are better for him than three great, fat pregnant she-camels

chapter.eng-name: The rewards associated with the Quran
